attributes.action: Step Down for the sake of the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gordon Brown should step down from his role of prime minister as he is bringing the country into disrepute.

We need a strong leader of government, not a leader who wants to stay on top while his support crumbles. He can bring in new recruits as support, but they have not got their own support to defend the leaders position.

Let the layman have a say. Step down from authority and annouce the election.. You know its a matter of time, and the more time you spend as leader, the more time is lost in recovery.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
